page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: We interviewed Mr. George, a farmer who lives in the area about his life. A day in the life of Mr. George, a farmer, begins at around 7:00am. by him getting up. He then checks his stock, and makes sure the troughs are full. He eats breakfast at 9:15. Mr. George is a part-time farmer; he is a seed merchant and sells to farmers in Mid-Cornwall. During the day, he checks nhis vegetables, and hedges and ploughs his fields. Tired after the days work, Mr. George retires to bed, usually at about 11:00pm. Mr. George is an arable farmer; he has 12 bullocks. Grasses are the main crops he grows on his farm, but he also grows sweetcorn, leeks, winter cauliflowers, and cabbages.
